entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -32.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
